name: Uncrewed
description: Uncrewed is a real-time strategy game for the PC with the ability to design units from scratch. Unlike in more traditional RTS, units obey the laws of physics, making design choices especially important.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.2 Ghz Dual Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with 512 MB of VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64 bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 6500 or equivalent Quad Core CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 950 GTX or equivalent video card with 2 GB of VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card
